TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EfxEffecti extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: A list of valid Int32 Effect/GetEffect parameters

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxEffecti ChorusPhase = int32(2)

Docs.summary: This property controls the phase difference between the left and right low-frequency oscillators. At zero degrees the two low-frequency oscillators are synchronized. Unit: Degrees Range [-180 .. 180] Default: 90

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxEffecti ChorusWaveform = int32(1)

Docs.summary: This property sets the waveform shape of the low-frequency oscillator that controls the delay time of the delayed signals. Unit: (0) Sinusoid, (1) Triangle Range [0 .. 1] Default: 1

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxEffecti CompressorOnoff = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Enabling this will result in audio exhibiting smaller variation in intensity between the loudest and quietest portions. Unit: (0) Off, (1) On Range [0 .. 1] Default: 1

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxEffecti EaxReverbDecayHFLimit = int32(23)

Docs.summary: When this flag is set, the high-frequency decay time automatically stays below a limit value that's derived from the setting of the property AirAbsorptionGainHF. Unit: (0) False, (1) True Range [False, True] Default: True

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxEffecti EffectType = int32(32769)

Docs.summary: Used with the enum EfxEffectType as it's parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxEffecti FlangerPhase = int32(2)

Docs.summary: This changes the phase difference between the left and right low-frequency oscillator's. At zero degrees the two low-frequency oscillators are synchronized. Range [-180 .. +180] Default: 0

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxEffecti FlangerWaveform = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Selects the shape of the low-frequency oscillator waveform that controls the amount of the delay of the sampled signal. Unit: (0) Sinusoid, (1) Triangle Range [0 .. 1] Default: 1

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxEffecti FrequencyShifterLeftDirection = int32(2)

Docs.summary: These select which internal signals are added together to produce the output. Unit: (0) Down, (1) Up, (2) Off Range [0 .. 2] Default: 0

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxEffecti FrequencyShifterRightDirection = int32(3)

Docs.summary: These select which internal signals are added together to produce the output. Unit: (0) Down, (1) Up, (2) Off Range [0 .. 2] Default: 0

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxEffecti PitchShifterCoarseTune = int32(1)

Docs.summary: This sets the number of semitones by which the pitch is shifted. There are 12 semitones per octave. Unit: Semitones Range [-12 .. +12] Default: +12

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxEffecti PitchShifterFineTune = int32(2)

Docs.summary: This sets the number of cents between Semitones a pitch is shifted. A Cent is 1/100th of a Semitone. Unit: Cents Range [-50 .. +50] Default: 0

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxEffecti ReverbDecayHFLimit = int32(13)

Docs.summary: When this flag is set, the high-frequency decay time automatically stays below a limit value that's derived from the setting of the property Air Absorption HF. Unit: (0) False, (1) True Range [False, True] Default: True

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxEffecti RingModulatorWaveform = int32(3)

Docs.summary: This controls which waveform is used as the carrier signal. Traditional ring modulator and tremolo effects generally use a sinusoidal carrier. Unit: (0) Sinusoid, (1) Sawtooth, (2) Square Range [0 .. 2] Default: 0

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxEffecti VocalMorpherPhonemeA = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Sets the vocal morpher 4-band formant filter A, used to impose vocal tract effects upon the input signal. The vocal morpher is not necessarily intended for use on voice signals; it is primarily intended for pitched noise effects, vocal-like wind effects, etc. Unit: Use enum EfxFormantFilterSettings Range [0 .. 29] Default: 0, "Phoneme A"

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxEffecti VocalMorpherPhonemeACoarseTuning = int32(2)

Docs.summary: This is used to adjust the pitch of phoneme filter A in 1-semitone increments. Unit: Semitones Range [-24 .. +24] Default: 0

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxEffecti VocalMorpherPhonemeB = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Sets the vocal morpher 4-band formant filter B, used to impose vocal tract effects upon the input signal. The vocal morpher is not necessarily intended for use on voice signals; it is primarily intended for pitched noise effects, vocal-like wind effects, etc. Unit: Use enum EfxFormantFilterSettings Range [0 .. 29] Default: 10, "Phoneme ER"

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxEffecti VocalMorpherPhonemeBCoarseTuning = int32(4)

Docs.summary: This is used to adjust the pitch of phoneme filter B in 1-semitone increments. Unit: Semitones Range [-24 .. +24] Default: 0

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Xamarin.iOS.dll=OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.EfxEffecti VocalMorpherWaveform = int32(5)

Docs.summary: This controls the shape of the low-frequency oscillator used to morph between the two phoneme filters. Unit: (0) Sinusoid, (1) Triangle, (2) Sawtooth Range [0 .. 2] Default: 0
